Work

Tyr

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, jQuery, Bootstrap
Tyr is search engine like website that lets you look up hundreds of thousands of both video games, movie and tv-shows. This project is still a work in progress but hopefully within the coming weeks I can get it to an acceptable mvp.

View Project GitHub

Weather Dashboard

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, jQuery, Bootstrap

A website that lets you look up any cities weather and a 5 day forecast. It also shows you the history of cities you've looked up as well as a delete button if you wish to delete a search.

View Project on GitHub

Birthday Button

Built With: HTML

Its a button that wishes you a happy birthday. I made this on the night of my birthday in about 20 minutes.
